LanguageData.AmmoSet_300mmRocket.label: 300mm long-range rockets
LanguageData.SADARM.label: Terminal-Sensitive Munition
LanguageData.SADARM.description: The terminal-sensitive munition is a type of smart ammunition that releases a large number of intelligent submunitions during the terminal phase of flight. These submunitions autonomously detect and attack targets, making it an excellent weapon for engaging armored clusters.
LanguageData.RailgunHE.label: Magnetic Rail Projectile HE
LanguageData.RailgunHE.description: The structure of the magnetic rail high-explosive projectile is similar to that of the magnetic rail armor-piercing projectile, featuring a sabot and an armature, but the armor-piercing payload is replaced with a preformed fragment payload designed to engage personnel and damage light structures.
